description: This file defines a React component for the Orders screen in a restaurant ordering app. It displays current cart details, allows placing an order, and shows recent orders.

methods.name: OrdersScreen
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the Orders screen, managing order placement and displaying recent orders.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Async function to submit the current cart as an order, update state with the new order, and clear the cart.
